page.title: 19VILLAGE FACILITIES
page.content: There are two shops in the village.One is a post office come general store.The other is a shop for Fancy Dress Costume Hire.For approx Â£7 a costume may be hired from a collection of nearly 200.Christmas and New Years Eve are the busiest time for the shop and the "Andy Pandy" costume is the most popular for ladies and the Cavalier for men.a mobile shop visits the village regularly as does the local library van.Daily papers are only delivered to peoples homes on a Sunday.There is one school in the village taking children from ages 5_9.They have to travel to Bletchley,Woburn Sands and Milton Keynes area for further education.There are no doctors or dentists in the village so the people have to go into the near by towns and their nearest hospital is at M.K.
